channel.title: Workantile on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Workantile on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for August 6, 2015 at Mi Compadre
item.description: The a2b3 lunch this week was at Mi Compadre, a Mexican place on Packard. We had a good turnout. I recommend the lengua tacos. I was inspired this week for the lunch question by going to the Workantile lunch on Wednesday, which followed the same general pattern - sit down, introduce yourself around the table, and answer some simple question. At Workantile the prompt was simply “share something nice that happened to you this week”, and that was enough of a prompt for everyone to be brief and cheery.

item.title: Tues 1/27: Lunch meeting to plan coworking space at Arcadian Too, Main St Ann Arbor
item.description: Noted 3/2011: this is the space that turned into the Workantile Exchange. Forwarded for Mike Kessler: What:    A free lunch meeting to introduce, create, and design the new coworking space in Ann Arbor Where:    118 S. Main St. in the former Arcadian Too Antiques space When:    Tuesday, January 27,  2009 12 Noon What:    Work has begun!  The space is being created.  Come and be an advocate for your vision of what the space looks like, acts like and how it is organized
